snippet: Scheduled to begin on Nov. 13, the auction by the F.C.C. is expected to raise at least $10 billion.
abstract: Verizon, AT&T, T-Mobile and satellite provider Dish Network plan to bid in Federal Communications Commission's November auction of airwaves.
lead_paragraph: Scheduled to begin on Nov. 13, the auction by the F.C.C. is expected to raise at least $10 billion.

headline.main: AT&T and Verizon Among Wireless Carriers Planning to Bid on Airwaves
headline.print_headline: Biggest Wireless Carriers Plan to Bid on Airwaves
